This session will introduce [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) for publishing reproducible, high-quality documents, such as slides, articles and dashboards, from within R. You can take a look at some examples in the [Quarto Gallery](https://quarto.org/docs/gallery/).

## Material

The material for the session will be available soon!
